meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 28, 2025, Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: A Right to Stay - Dallas Neighborhood Anti-Displacement Toolkit
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the toolkit for Dallas neighborhoods experiencing gentrification and displacement.
agenda_items.presenter: James Armstrong III, President & CEO, Builders of Hope CDC; Stephanie Champion, Chief of Community Development & Policy, Builders of Hope CDC

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing and Community Development Properties Update
agenda_items.description: Update on projects located at various addresses.
agenda_items.presenter: Christine Crossley, Director, Office of Homeless Solutions; Darwin Wade, Assistant Director, Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Items on the March 26, 2025 City Council Agenda
agenda_items.description: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire and develop a mixed-income multifamily development.
agenda_items.presenter: Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson, Director, Department of Housing & Community Development; Jaclyn Schroeder, Administrator (I), Department of Housing & Community Development

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homelessness Solutions (HHS) Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Briefing items to be placed on the HHS Committee agendas for upcoming months.
